description: Utility object for retrieving environment variables related to Supabase configuration, either from system environment variables or shared preferences in an Android context.

classes.name: EnvUtils
classes.description: An object providing methods to access environment-specific configuration variables such as SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_KEY.

methods.name: getSupabaseUrl
methods.description: Retrieves the Supabase URL from environment variables or shared preferences.

methods.name: getSupabaseKey
methods.description: Retrieves the Supabase Key from environment variables or shared preferences.
